message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $15,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in purchasing the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but the product's value is considerably higher than that. Could you consider $13,500?
I appreciate your understanding, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
